TopicTitle: Minimum of 24 FULL fuel tanks in stable nearly circular orbit

Articles.Content:
In anticipation of the future fuel requirements of my space ventures, I have been working hard on getting 24 tanks into orbit for a while now.. I can get close but fuel to weight ratio on lifting stages gets to be extreme and I tend to be a bit short of an orbit every time.

Just tossing out a goal of getting a fuel station into orbit with a single rig

Stock is the only option here.. i dont want to see any modded stuff.

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=7155.0

This challenge already exists. Current record is 48 tanks.
